summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Aleesa Ethnic Wear e-commerce application. All backend APIs (25 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all major flows including home page, collection browsing, product details, cart management, and authentication.
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Cart uses X-Session-ID header for guest tracking - working correctly
Authentication flow with JWT tokens is properly implemented
Product variants with color/size selection working correctly
seed_data_creation: Test user created during registration test with random email
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core e-commerce flows are working: product browsing, filtering, sorting, cart management (add/update/remove), authentication (login/register), and checkout redirect. Backend APIs are fully functional with proper error handling. Frontend uses React Router for navigation, Sonner for toast notifications, and Tailwind CSS for styling.

home_page.details: Hero section, categories, featured products all loading correctly

collection_page.details: Products display with filters (price, size, color) and sorting options working

product_detail_page.details: Product info, variant selection, size selection, Add to Cart all working

cart_functionality.details: Add to cart, view cart, quantity controls, order summary all working

authentication.details: Login with demo credentials works, registration form renders correctly

checkout.details: Correctly redirects unauthenticated users to login

navigation.details: All category navigation links work correctly

backend_apis.details: All 25 API tests passed - health, categories, products, auth, cart
